Title: Full Stack React Developer
Description:
Antuit.ai is the leader in AI-powered SaaS solutions for consumer products manufacturers and retailers. For consumer products, we offer a suite of AI Forecasting and Planning solutions for supply chain and revenue growth management. For retail, we offer a suite of AI Merchandising solutions that address demand forecasting, omnichannel inventory optimization, lifecycle pricing, and personalized marketing.
Antuit.ai's executives, comprised of industry leaders from Accenture, McKinsey, IBM, and SAS, and our team of PH.D.'s, data scientists, technologists, and domain experts, are passionate about delivering real value to our clients. Antuit.ai is funded by Goldman Sachs and Zodius Capital.
The Role:
Antuit.ai is interested in hiring a Full Stack React Developer for product engineering work on Antuit solutions. The successful candidate should have expert level experience developing production React software. S/he should have experience in working in Agile based projects and should be able to work in a fast paced and result oriented environment.
Qualifications and Skills:
The successful candidate will have the following profile/experience:
Minimum 4+ years relevant experience, Bachelor's degree in technological or related field a plus
Minimum 3+ years experience building full-stack applications using JavaScript technologies
Minimum 2+ years experience developing front-end web user interfaces with React
Experience with designing RESTful/GraphQL backend services and developing them using Node.js
Experience with build tools like webpack, npm, or gulp/grunt
Experience with Test-Driven Development using automated testing frameworks such as Jest, Sinon, and Enzyme
Experience ensuring your code builds and deploys properly through Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment processes built-in Jenkins
Experience with version control tools, such as Git
Experience with cloud technologies such as Docker and/or Kubernetes a plus
Expertise working as part of a dynamic, interactive Agile team developing and delivering functional applications
Ability to work with and coordinate with other developers using digital tools such as Microsoft Teams and/or Slack
Knowledge of modern design patterns and building enterprise-grade production applications
Demonstrated ability to learn new technologies quickly and independently.
Experience working on agile projects and understanding of agile concepts
Experience using Atlassian products like Jira is preferred
Ability to work and achieve stretch goals in a very innovative and fast paced environment.
Excellent English verbal and written communication skills, especially in technical communications
Strong inter-personal skills and a desire to work collaboratively
Information Security Responsibilities
Understand and adhere to Information Security policies, guidelines and procedure, practice them for protection of organizational data and Information System.
Take part in Information Security training and act accordingly while handling information.
Report all suspected security and policy breach to Infosec team or appropriate authority (CISO).
EEOC
Antuit.ai is an at-will, equal opportunity employer. We consider applicants for all positions without regard to race, color, religion, national origin or ancestry, gender identity, sex, age (40+), marital status, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected status under local, state, or federal law.
To apply, please send your resume or CV to careers@antuit.ai.

Title: Lead Software Engineer
Description:
What makes Gartner a GREAT fit for you? When you join Gartner, you’ll be part of a fast-growing team that helps the world become smarter and more connected. We’re the world’s leading research and advisory company, achieving consistent double-digit growth by steering clients toward the right decisions with business and technology insights they can’t find anywhere else. Our associates enjoy a collaborative work environment, exceptional training and career development — as well as unlimited growth opportunities. If you like working with a curious, supportive, high-performing team, Gartner is the place for you.
About this role:
Gartner is looking for a Lead Software Engineer. This person will be a part of team developing and supporting Gartner ‘s Email Platform. This position will provide an opportunity to work on several different technologies focusing on micro services in Java, Spring, AWS . This includes supporting the current Email Applications and building new ones to increase the client engagement and to enhance the Email architecture.
What you’ll do:
Architectural design of large scale, modern distributed applications and thought leadership
This position requires strong technical skills and an ability to resolve complex problems while working on time-boxed, multiple concurrent development projects.
Peer technical review including design, code review and testing.
Understand, suggest and choose from possible technical solutions/tools to satisfy business needs-choices that reflect a solution that balances design, use, and support. Use the best practices/techniques for keeping the design/solution under control without excessive work or rework.
Demonstrate strong understand of Open Source technologies, framework, tools and trends.
What you’ll need:
University degree in Bachelor of Engineering or a Master s degree in CS with 9-12 years of experience in software development, of which 2-3 years must have been in a lead capacity.
Experience with micro services architectures
Experience with Container technologies like Docker, Consul, Nomad, Vault, Kubernetes, etc.
Experience with internal Search engines (Solr, Elasticsearch, etc.)
Experience with different databases technologies (Relational, NoSQL, Graph, Document, Key-Value, Time Series, etc.). This should include building and managing scalable data models.
Experience with front end web frameworks like React and Angular.
Experience with cloud-based platforms (AWS)
Experience in developing and consuming web services
Experience using automated build systems (CI/CD)
Experience working in different programming languages (Python, Java, Javascript, etc.)
Experience with BI &Analytics tools like Power BI, Kibana or Grafana
Experience with Big Data tools like Hadoop, EMR, Spark
Experience with version control tools (Git, Subversion)
Strong knowledge of integration technologies (REST, JSON, XML, HTTP, etc.)
Demonstrable experience innovating with technology
Ability to interact well with both internal associates and external clients in resolving operational issues.
Ability to provide accurate estimates of technology work and deliver high quality work on schedule
Ability to identify system operational issues and resolve them
Who you are:
Someone who has significant experience in working directly with Business users in problem solving
Able to lead and execute a mix of small/medium sized projects simultaneously
Excellent Communication and Prioritization skills.
Ability to work collaboratively across the IT organization (infrastructure/test/back office groups).
Ability to pick up Gartner domain knowledge quickly
Ability to work independently or within a team, proactively, in a fast-paced AGILE-SCRUM environment.
Owns success takes responsibility for successful delivery of the solutions.
Strong desire to improve upon their skills in software development, frameworks and technologies
What we offer:
In addition to an outstanding work environment with rapid advancement potential, Gartner associates enjoy exceptional compensation and benefits, including:
An upbeat, positive culture. Integrity, objectivity, collaboration, results and a no-limits mindset are central to our values
Limitless growth. We work with you to help you meet your goals and advance within the company
Encouragement to be innovative and challenge status quo
Exposure to industry leading training and development
Performance based recognition and rewards
About Gartner:

Gartner, Inc. (NYSE: IT) is the world’s leading information technology research and advisory company. We deliver the technology-related insight necessary for our clients to make the right decisions, every day. We work with every client to research, analyze and interpret the business of IT within the context of their individual role. Founded in 1979, Gartner is headquartered in Stamford, Connecticut, U.S.A. – Visit gartner.com to learn more.

Diversity, inclusion and engagement at Gartner:

The policy of Gartner is to provide equal employment opportunities to all applicants and employees without regard to race, color, caste, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, citizenship status, age, national origin, ancestry, disability, or any other characteristic protected by applicable law. Gartner affirmatively seeks to advance the principles of equal employment opportunity and values diversity and inclusion.
Gartner is an Equal Opportunity Employer and offers opportunities to all job seekers, including job seekers with disabilities. If you are a qualified applicant with a disability and unable to or limited in your ability to use or access the Gartner’s career webpage as a result of your disability, you may request reasonable accommodations by calling Human Resources at +1203-964-0096 or by sending an email to Applicant.Assistance@gartner.com
Job Requisition ID:46676
By submitting your information and application, you confirm that you have read and agree to the country or regional recruitment notice linked below applicable to your place of residence.
Gartner Applicant Privacy Link: https://jobs.gartner.com/applicant-privacy-policy

Title: Salesforce Developer
Description:
Huron helps its clients drive growth, enhance performance and sustain leadership in the markets they serve. We partner with a number of industries to develop strategies and implement solutions that enable the transformative change our clients need to own their future. Together, we empower clients to navigate financial disruption.

As a leader in technology implementations – from on-premise software to multi-year cloud-based enterprise-wide deployments, we have significant Oracle and Salesforce expertise and are the largest and fastest-growing EPM firm in North America. Our expertise in full-service enterprise performance management (EPM), enterprise resource planning (ERP), business intelligence and analytics, customer relationship management (CRM), and data management services helps drive results and creates a competitive advantage. Huron is a Platinum level member of the Oracle Partner Network (OPN), a Workday Services Partner, and a Gold level consulting partner with Salesforce.com.

You’ll deliver technology and analytic solutions that enable organizations to manage and optimize their financial performance, operational efficiency, and client or stakeholder experience.

Join our team as the expert you are now and create your future.
Position Summary:
Salesforce developer with 2 to 4 years of experience in Salesforce. Hands on experience with configuration, apex coding, lightning. Experience with design, development and deployment.
Qualifications:
Any graduate experience.
Experience with design, development and deployment.
About Huron:
At Huron, we’re redefining what a consulting organization can be. We go beyond advice to deliver results that last. We inherit our client’s challenges as if they were our own. We help them transform for the future. We advocate. We make a difference. And we intelligently, passionately, relentlessly do great work…together.
Are you the kind of person who stands ready to jump in, roll up your sleeves and transform ideas into action? Then come discover Huron.
Whether you have years of experience or come right out of college, we invite you to explore our many opportunities. Find out how you can use your talents and develop your skills to make an impact immediately. Learn about how our culture and values provide you with the kind of environment that invites new ideas and innovation. Come see how we collaborate with each other in a culture of learning, coaching, diversity and inclusion. And hear about our unwavering commitment to make a difference in partnership with our clients, shareholders, communities and colleagues.
We offer a competitive compensation/benefits package. Huron is an equal opportunity employer. Title: Devops Engineer For top MNC
Description:
Job description
Carrier Corporation is an American air conditioning brand of the UTC Climate, Controls & Security. It was founded in 1915 as an independent company manufacturing and distributing heating, ventilating and air conditioning (HVAC) systems, as well as commercial refrigeration and food service equipment. As of 2018, it was a $18.5 billion company with over 43,000 employees serving customers in 170 countries on six continents

For its R&D centre in Hyderabad, UTC HVAC (Carrier) is looking for an AWS lead engineer.

YOU ARE EXPECTED TO

Design, build and maintain the CI/CD infrastructure and tools for Enterprise deployments.

Design and develop the automation to validate the builds in the CI/CD pipeline.

Work closely with development teams to ensure that solutions are designed with scale/performance and operability in mind

Meet project plans for the project; prioritizing work to accomplish demanding changes.

Manage multiple releases of the products.

Co-ordinate and work in global team environment.

Stay abreast of technology developments and their potential impact and opportunities on the organization.

Proactively identify, recommend, and implement improvement to the release engineering process.

Contribute to software engineering teams and demonstrate strong software engineering and process improvement.

Demonstrate experience and knowledge in distributed release management strategies spanning across geographies.

Apply your expertise in continuous-integration and continuous-deployment models.

Be aware of Agile, Incremental or spiral development methodology.

REQUIRED EDUCATION/EXPERIENCE

BE/B.Tech/M.Tech/MCA
Must have 7-10 years related experience in DevOps engineering activities.

MUST HAVE SKILLS

You should have experience in implementing CI/CD pipeline for on-prem applications and Cloud applications.

You should have experience with scripting language such as PowerShell/Python. Any other programming language experience is a plus.

You should have experience in setting up build and deployment pipelines using tools such as Octopus deploy, VSTS,AzureDevops, Jenkins

You should have experience with GitHub, TeamCity\Jenkins

You should have experience in Linux & Windows administration.

You should have have experience in Kubernetes, EKS, AWS, Docker, Nutanix, VMWare.

You should have knowledge of best practices and IT operations in an always-up, always-available service.

You should be able to manage infrastructure like creation & maintenance of resource groups on Azure or AWS cloud.

You should be able to develop scripts to create cloud resources through automated scripts / ARM templates.

You should have experience in integrating white sourcing & static code analysis tools in CI pipeline.

You should have experience in creating & maintaining build server, support for periodic release.

You should have a strong understanding of deployment to cloud IaaS, PaaS models.

You should have the ability of resource creation, auto scaling, DR, application monitoring, VM creation, Dockers/ containers.

You should have experience in application migration from Azure to AWS or vice versa will be an advantage.

You should have a strong understanding of code branching, merging, versioning. Build versioning.

You should have experience in LDAP / SAML integration with tool chains likeGit Hub / Jenkins/ VSTS.

You should have experience in Linux, Shell Scripting.

You should be able to diagnose the reports from cloud application monitoring and support the application developer in root cause analysis.

You should be able to manage/ Map DNS, Certificate management.

You should have a strong understanding of Azure/ AWS pricing mechanism, monitor and report the resource consumption on regular basis.

SALARY AND JOINING

The position will pay quite well - Rs. 18-23 lakhs per annum is the band, and the final amount may be even higher depending on your experience and expertise.

If made an offer, you will need to join in 4 weeks.

This is the opportunity of a lifetime for people looking to specialize in highly coveted niche futuristic skills, and to work in a top multinational company with excellent employee-first initiatives. We look forward to your application.

NOTE

This will start off as a probationary position for upto 6 months, and will convert to a permanent position after that subject to your performance and other critieria. (During the probationary period, you will be on the rolls of a partner company of Carrier.)

7.00-10.00 Years
Bachelor Of Technology (B.Tech/B.E)

Title: Front End Developer
Description:
Front end Job Description

Gravity is a design and innovation consulting firm with a vision for disrupting the traditional consulting domain. We are powered by our Innovation Lab, where we challenge established ways of addressing business complexity through business design, service design and product design.

StrategyDotZero is Gravity’s proprietary platform intended to disrupt the way strategy is designed and executed across organisations. StrategyDotZero is a cloud-based application that takes a systemic and collaborative approach to strategy design and execution focussed on strategic alignment, capability improvement and enterprise business performance management.

Our vision for the product to is to develop the next generation hybrid technology platform for future enterprises, connecting diverse methods, knowledge and emerging technologies.

The future roadmap for the product intends to develop a platform based architecture that will feature a storytelling user experience, build dynamic content, enable contextual analytics and develop collaborative intelligence through intelligent learning, analytics and information sharing models.

We are currently looking for bright minded software engineers for full-time roles within our product development team. If you have strong knowledge of Web Technologies with an aptitude and desire to learn and co-design next generation solutions that span machine learning, big data or advanced analytics, we would encourage you to get in touch

Excellent eye for detail in the front end design

Good understanding of advanced JavaScript libraries and frameworks. Proficient in Angular 4 and above.

Good understanding of using graphical libraries such as D3JS, ThreeJS, RaphaelJS, or similar in building rich SVG graphical user interfaces.

Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS

Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX

Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.

Working knowledge of programming bots and machine learning concepts.

Ability to clearly communicate ideas and opinions

Ability to innovate and identify opportunities and alternate ways of doing things

Working with Agile teams and methodologies

Get hands on experience working on real client projects

Exposure to industry best practices

Work with an inter-disciplinary team of designers, business consultants and software developers

Title: Devops Engineer For top MNC
Description:
Job description
Carrier Corporation is an American air conditioning brand of the UTC Climate, Controls & Security. It was founded in 1915 as an independent company manufacturing and distributing heating, ventilating and air conditioning (HVAC) systems, as well as commercial refrigeration and food service equipment. As of 2018, it was a $18.5 billion company with over 43,000 employees serving customers in 170 countries on six continents

For its R&D centre in Hyderabad, UTC HVAC (Carrier) is looking for an AWS lead engineer.

YOU ARE EXPECTED TO

Design, build and maintain the CI/CD infrastructure and tools for Enterprise deployments.

Design and develop the automation to validate the builds in the CI/CD pipeline.

Work closely with development teams to ensure that solutions are designed with scale/performance and operability in mind

Meet project plans for the project; prioritizing work to accomplish demanding changes.

Manage multiple releases of the products.

Co-ordinate and work in global team environment.

Stay abreast of technology developments and their potential impact and opportunities on the organization.

Proactively identify, recommend, and implement improvement to the release engineering process.

Contribute to software engineering teams and demonstrate strong software engineering and process improvement.

Demonstrate experience and knowledge in distributed release management strategies spanning across geographies.

Apply your expertise in continuous-integration and continuous-deployment models.

Be aware of Agile, Incremental or spiral development methodology.

REQUIRED EDUCATION/EXPERIENCE

BE/B.Tech/M.Tech/MCA
Must have 7-10 years related experience in DevOps engineering activities.

MUST HAVE SKILLS

You should have experience in implementing CI/CD pipeline for on-prem applications and Cloud applications.

You should have experience with scripting language such as PowerShell/Python. Any other programming language experience is a plus.

You should have experience in setting up build and deployment pipelines using tools such as Octopus deploy, VSTS,AzureDevops, Jenkins

You should have experience with GitHub, TeamCity\Jenkins

You should have experience in Linux & Windows administration.

You should have have experience in Kubernetes, EKS, AWS, Docker, Nutanix, VMWare.

You should have knowledge of best practices and IT operations in an always-up, always-available service.

You should be able to manage infrastructure like creation & maintenance of resource groups on Azure or AWS cloud.

You should be able to develop scripts to create cloud resources through automated scripts / ARM templates.

You should have experience in integrating white sourcing & static code analysis tools in CI pipeline.

You should have experience in creating & maintaining build server, support for periodic release.

You should have a strong understanding of deployment to cloud IaaS, PaaS models.

You should have the ability of resource creation, auto scaling, DR, application monitoring, VM creation, Dockers/ containers.

You should have experience in application migration from Azure to AWS or vice versa will be an advantage.

You should have a strong understanding of code branching, merging, versioning. Build versioning.

You should have experience in LDAP / SAML integration with tool chains likeGit Hub / Jenkins/ VSTS.

You should have experience in Linux, Shell Scripting.

You should be able to diagnose the reports from cloud application monitoring and support the application developer in root cause analysis.

You should be able to manage/ Map DNS, Certificate management.

You should have a strong understanding of Azure/ AWS pricing mechanism, monitor and report the resource consumption on regular basis.

SALARY AND JOINING

The position will pay quite well - Rs. 18-23 lakhs per annum is the band, and the final amount may be even higher depending on your experience and expertise.

If made an offer, you will need to join in 4 weeks.

This is the opportunity of a lifetime for people looking to specialize in highly coveted niche futuristic skills, and to work in a top multinational company with excellent employee-first initiatives. We look forward to your application.

NOTE

This will start off as a probationary position for upto 6 months, and will convert to a permanent position after that subject to your performance and other critieria. (During the probationary period, you will be on the rolls of a partner company of Carrier.)

7.00-10.00 Years
Bachelor Of Technology (B.Tech/B.E)

Title: CSII - Item and inventory - Software Engineering III (JAVA)
Description:
Our Company

We help people around the world save money and live better - anytime and anywhere - in retail stores, online and through their mobile devices. Each week, more than 220 million customers and members visit our 11,096 stores under 69 banners in 27 countries and e-commerce websites in 10 countries. With last fiscal revenues of approximately $486 billion, Walmart employs 2.2 million employees worldwide.

@ Walmart Labs in Chennai, we use technology for the charter of building brand new platforms and services on the latest technology stack to support both our stores and e-commerce businesses worldwide.

Our Team:
CSII Team is responsible for building data driven highly optimized supply chain suite of products to manage entire gamut of supply chain lifecycle for our retail and ecommerce lines of business. With our rapidly increasing footfalls in stores and exponential growth in online orders; this all has to be done to scale millions of owned and marketplace SKU’s complete inbound and outbound fulfilment lifecycles.
Team’s mission - “Enable customers to receive their orders when and where they want in an innovative and cost effective way for Walmart“ derives from Walmart’s mission statement - “Save Money. Live Better” complementing our organization’s philosophy to deliver low prices every day, on everything.
How we achieve this, comes down to the team of smartest technologists from India focused on the entire suite of supply chain management products for the Walmart Supply Chain at a massive scale. From forecasting & replenishing inventory for millions of items worth billions of dollars, sourcing of millions of orders, to route optimization & last mile delivery to Warehouse Management Systems to most advanced grocery & order management systems; technology is the backbone behind the entire platform enabling the massive cloud-scale supply chain from India.

With over 4,000 associates in Silicon Valley, San Diego, Portland, Brazil, United Kingdom and India, we’re bringing together some of the best professionals from around the world. If you’re inspired by the opportunity to solve complex problems at scale and make a difference for our customers and members, join us.

Your Opportunity

Software Engineer
This position, Software Engineer, will be on the Walmart Labs Supply Chain team, focused on building Walmart's best in class Supply Chain. At Walmart Labs, you will… Work with small teams of talented engineers to build a best-in-class supply chain at Walmart. Be given the freedom to try new things and prove the value of your own ideas and innovations and own them all the way to production Identify and facilitate the removal of team impediments and escalate as appropriate Foster a motivating culture of openness, collaboration, and continuous improvement Ensure business needs are being met using software engineering best practices Participate in internal hackathons and innovation challenges!.

Develop interactive, user-friendly applications using the latest frameworks which are open source and proprietary
Help the team leverage and contribute to open source technologies
Contribute to code review and mentoring initiatives
Make impact on a global scale

Your Responsibility
Design, build, test and deploy cutting edge solutions at scale, impacting millions of customers worldwide.

Interact with Walmart engineering teams across geographies to leverage expertise and contribute to the tech community. Engage with Product Management and Business to drive the agenda, set your priorities and deliver awesome products.

Your Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related discipline with 4-8+ years’ experience
Backend with Java, Spring, Spring Boot
Hands-on experience on REST, GraphQL , JSON
Backend development with Java JEE, Hibernate
Have experience with at least one SQL and NoSQL DBs such as Mongo, Cassandra
Should be knowledgeable in Design Patterns and Algorithms.
Knowledgeable on CI/CD pipelines.
Knowledge on messaging platforms (JMS & Kafka).
Knowledge on building cloud native applications.
Micro services and knowledge of major software patterns,
exposure to Kafka, nodeJs, UI Frameworks like Angular, React, Container technology including Docker, Troubleshooting Skills
Exposure to API and UI testing frameworks

Company Profile
Astroved.com Pvt Ltd
Astroved is a fast-growing consumer internet company focused on bringing Vedic Astrological content and services to consumers worldwide. We incorporate ancient wisdom into modern applications to improve our customers’ lives. Offerings include a wide range of predictive services in the areas of health, wealth/finance, career, relationship and other life matters, as well as a full array of traditional remedial services.
We aim to transform our members’ lives by developing top tier, scientifically validated astrology and Vedic-based services and applications to address the problems with which one struggles. Key to this is establishing research and development initiatives and building B2B partnerships and alliances with synergistic institutions.
Founded in 2001 by visionary founder Dr. Baskaran Pillai, Astroved has a strong team with domain expertise in the astrology arena, a talented technical staff and management presence in both the U.S. and India.
With loyal customers in U.S., Europe, Asia and India, Astroved has already attained global market presence. Astroved has an active list of over 200,000 customers worldwide and access to over 3M engaged consumers through Dr. Pillai’s presence on YouTube and other media.
Unlike many internet-based astrology companies, Astroved is already profitable and generating cash. Poised for next phase of growth.

Title: Tech Lead Product Owner
Description:
The Product Manager oversees Developer and Support tools under the direction of the Product Partner Ecosystem group, aiming at the flawless execution of the activities within the Ecosystem Program. He/she is the product champion within the company and will be viewed as the "expert" for accurate and credible information on the product. The Product Manager is responsible for establishing, maintaining and planning the overall developer tools including developer portal, certification program while interacting with engineering, services, corporate IT and operations group. The Product Manager is responsible for creating the concepts, requirements and a variety of analyses for new products and product improvements.
Major Functions/Responsibility
Set the solution marketplace, developer and support tools for partner programs, prioritize features, build consensus, and coordinate product schedules with developers and/or partners to deliver high-quality experiences for our internal teams and our customers and partners.
Build use cases and user stories around the tools requirements and communicate them effectively.
Maintain a roadmap for partner certification program, developer portal to delight users and increase Customer and Partner satisfactions.
Integrate user research, analysis, and stakeholder feedback into your product requirements to ensure products satisfy user needs as well as meet the needs of the business.
Facilitate communication throughout the development process by partnering with key departments, especially engineering, services, operations and corporate IT.
Identify methods and metrics for identifying success and failures.
Coordinate with other product managers to ensure cohesiveness.
Demonstrates good judgment in selecting methods and techniques for obtaining solution.
Empowers internal personnel by sharing area of expertise freely vs hoarding knowledge
Performs other duties, as assigned.
Acting subject matter expert expected to know and understand new features and feature improvement.

Title: Java Developer-SRD
Description:
Java Developer-SRD
Job Number:
3154012
POSTING DATE: Jul 15, 2020
PRIMARY LOCATION: Non-Japan Asia-India-Maharashtra-Mumbai (MSA)
EDUCATION LEVEL: Bachelor's Degree
JOB: Development
EMPLOYMENT TYPE: Full Time
JOB LEVEL: Associate
DESCRIPTION
About Us

Morgan Stanley is a leading global financial services firm providing a wide range of investment banking, securities, investment management and wealth management services. The Firm's employees serve clients worldwide including corporations, governments and individuals from more than 1,200 offices in 43 countries.
As a market leader, the talent and passion of our people is critical to our success. Together, we share a common set of values rooted in integrity, excellence and strong team ethic. Morgan Stanley can provide a superior foundation for building a professional career - a place for people to learn, to achieve and grow. A philosophy that balances personal lifestyles, perspectives and needs is an important part of our culture.
Technology/Role/Department at Morgan Stanley
The Securities Reference Data department develops and manages data processing, visualization, management and storage technology for the key attributes of financial instruments traded across the globe. This infrastructure contains the details of millions of products, is used by over 1000 internal applications across all core business functions of the Firm from low latency electronic trading and market making, right through to risk, reporting and settlement across Institutional Equity and Fixed Income and our Wealth Management divisions.
One of the key functions of the Securities Reference Data technology platform is to develop infrastructure that distributes our data from our master repositories to various alternate technical platforms ensuring all data comes from appropriate authoritative sources and is solely maintained by this distribution technology. The team has embarked on an effort to close significant outstanding gaps in the data coverage handled by this technology, which will also include the build-out of several key services to progress future data integration strategy.
This position is for Senior Software Developer for Product Reference Data, part of the TEDRA at our Mumbai Office. The candidate will join a global Product Reference Data Development team tasked with developing and maintaining the pricing data interfaces and infrastructure developing a number of green field applications, helping operations to streamline and re-engineer their processes and address outstanding audit requirements.
Candidate will have an opportunity to work directly with the users, business analyst, translate business requirements into the technical architecture and manage overall deliverables. Further the candidate need to have strong skills of executing projects and sustaining complex IT applications using well known SDLC methodologies like Agile etc. The candidate should expect to work in a global virtual team environment along with Bangalore, Mumbai, New York and London teams. The candidate may be responsible for more than one project at a time.
Success in this position requires a range of skills, both interpersonal and technical. It requires a solid foundation across the complete spectrum of software engineering of distributed systems using Java/J2EE/Perl as core set of technologies. The candidate should be comfortable working across all the tiers in the proposed solution: RDBMS, batch processes, application servers.
Quality best practices are also essential, such as software validation techniques, design and implementation documentation, and robust code construction practices. As the role demands individuals ability to scale across ongoing BAU and green-field developments; initiatives on the cutting edge of implementation approach and performance requirements, a highly proactive, self-motivated, fast learner is needed to research solutions and power past technical challenges as they arise. Must be self-confident, intellectually honest, open-minded, helpful and respectful- but also able to passionately and articulately present and defend their ideas and positions.
Job Responsibilities
The candidate may be responsible for more than one project at a time.
Success in this position requires a range of skills, both interpersonal and technical.
It requires a solid foundation across the complete spectrum of software engineering of distributed systems using Java/J2EE/Perl as core set of technologies.
The candidate should be comfortable working across all the tiers in the proposed solution: RDBMS, batch processes, application servers.
Quality best practices are also essential, such as software validation techniques, design and implementation documentation, and robust code construction practices.
As the role demands individuals ability to scale across ongoing BAU and green-field developments; initiatives on the cutting edge of implementation approach and performance requirements, a highly proactive, self-motivated, fast learner is needed to research solutions and power past technical challenges as they arise.
Must be self-confident, intellectually honest, open-minded, helpful and respectful- but also able to passionately and articulately present and defend their ideas and positions.

QUALIFICATIONS
Skills required (essential):
Minimum Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field.
5 plus years of experience in a related field with minimum 2 years in technical lead position, preferably in Financial Services or Wealth Management organization.
Strong development experience with Core Java and Spring.
Knowledge of open source frameworks: Spring, Hibernate, XMLBeans, JAXB
Experience working with relational databases (e.g., Sybase, Oracle or DB2) to develop schema, stored procedures or native SQL.
Integration middleware products, Service Oriented Architecture, ExtJS, JavaScript, HTML, CSS,
Past experience on REST, Ajax, SOA2, RDBMS (Sybase and/or DB2), ORM Tools (Hibernate), XML and Schemas.
Strong understanding of SDLC methodologies.
Design Patterns (GoF & J2EE).
Strong sense of ownership & accountability of work.
Candidate will be required to work geographically dispersed teams, specially team(s) in New York, London and India.
Strong communication skills
Experience with multithreaded systems (Good to Have).

Title: Java IT Architect - Digital
Description:
Position Type :
Full time
Type Of Hire :
Experienced (relevant combo of work and education)
Education Desired :
Bachelor of Computer Science
Travel Percentage :
0%
Are you curious, motivated, and forward-thinking? At FIS, you’ll have the opportunity to work on some of the most challenging and relevant issues in financial services and technology. Our talented people empower us, and we believe in being part of a team that is open, collaborative, entrepreneurial, passionate and above all fun.
Java Technical Architect
Required Experience – 12+ Years
Work Location – Whitefield, Bangalore
Educational Qualification – Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in IT/Computer Science/Equivalent
Primary Skills:
Java Technical Architect
Spring Boot
Microservices Architecture
Agile/Scrum Methodologies
About Team & Product/Project Details:
This is the new business organization of FIS that provides payment solutions for financial institutions, retailers and businesses offering a comprehensive suits of payment products & services
It supports more than 300 payment types across more than 140 countries in over 120 currencies
In championing the (whole) system view and the solution context, the team influences the strategic architecture and a wide spectrum of project/operational stakeholders
What you will be doing:
You will co-lead the technical and architectural aspects of the Digital Services ‘system’ in its development, maintenance, communication and implementations
You will be responsible for technology design decisions which have major and far-reaching impact on the implementation of technology in the company, on projects and the IT delivery
This will include hands-on development/delivery of frameworks and key software components
Define High Level Designs. These will include
Analyses of technical trade-offs,
Determination of the primary components and subsystems, (and identifying the interfaces and collaborations between them)
Inputs from more specialized areas like security, data, infrastructure. (Core technologies involves C# and Java interacting with Oracle based resources).
Provide Solution Design leadership with the various agile teams on the train.
Co-operate the technology governance framework (TDA: Technical Decision Authority) in order to assess all projects and initiatives are ‘fit’ against the group technology strategy, architecture and policies, working to resolve non-conformance with the train
What you bring:
Strong experience in Java Technical Architect based role and responsibilities
Must have exposure in Spring Boot, Microservices architecture
Sound exposure in Spring and Hibernate
Experience of designing Enterprise-grade architectures
Exposure in Agile or Scrum Methodologies
Experience of database design in large database systems
Excellent communication skills and an ability to translate between business and technical terminology with clarity are key to success in this role
Proven ability to project solutions made up of validated technologies stack
Ability to coordinate and manage disparate development teams to ensure that solution designs are implemented correctly
Evidenced track record of the development and maintenance of IT architecture and IT strategy, with applied understanding, at an enterprise level of application, infrastructure, data or security architecture
Added bonus if you have:
Web Services – Rest / SOAP
Some understanding of financial services and the electronic payments space.
Understanding of industry best practice and trends together with their application within a business context
Significant breadth of technical and strategic understanding in several of application, infrastructure, data and security field
What We offer You:
A range of benefits designed to help support your lifestyle and wellbeing
A multi-faceted job with a broad spectrum of responsibilities
An international work environment and a dedicated and innovative team
Privacy Statement
FIS is committed to protecting the privacy and security of all personal information that we process in order to provide services to our clients. For specific information on how FIS protects personal information online, please see the Online Privacy Notice.
Sourcing Model
Recruitment at FIS works primarily on a direct sourcing model; a relatively small portion of our hiring is through recruitment agencies. FIS does not accept resumes from recruitment agencies which are not on the preferred supplier list and is not responsible for any related fees for resumes submitted to job postings, our employees, or any other part of our company.

Digital Guardian is a collaborative group of hands-on, game changing innovators, willing to do what it takes to get the job done! We strive to engage, develop, and retain top talent by fostering an environment where individuals can
succeed.

For more than 15 years, Digital Guardian has enabled data-rich organizations to protect their most valuable assets with an on-premises deployment or an outsourced managed security program (MSP). Digital Guardian sets the standard on how to protect data!

Currently, we are looking for a high performing Principal Engineer to join our team at our Hyderabad office! As a Principal Engineer you will champion efforts to define methods to improve the quality and stability of the Next Generation Data Protection Platform for Digital Guardian. Master’s or bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent.

Career Growth

Title: Test Bench Architect
Description:
Job Description
Centum Adeneo India is a Business unit of Centum Electronics Group offers a wide range of electronic and embedded systems design engineering services to Global Customers to help them realize complex products and sub systems. Centum-Adeneo India (CAI) is an Electronics Design Center of Excellence, designing for mission critical projects in Aerospace/Space, Transportation, Medical Electronics, Defense Electronics etc. It has other design centers in the France, USA, Canada & Germany.

The ideal candidate is a self-motivated, multi-tasker, and demonstrated team-player. You will be responsible for the delivery of the items assigned to you with quality and should interact with cross functional team and resolve the problem. You should excel in working with global stakeholders and have outstanding communication and leadership skills and report to the Project Manager.

What You'll Do

Develop and deploy test system software using NI Labview. Develop test sequences; deploy user interfaces with easy-to-use operational features. Integration and validation of test systems.
Work along with PM-TBE to understand the technical requirements specifications; specify test system architecture.
Design, develop and deploy test systems using the NI LabVIEW software.
Interface with production engineering for successful deployment of automated test schemes and test management.
Work closely with the Project Manager-TBE and peer team members from Hardware and Mechanical disciplines for successfully delivering the test bench solutions.
Support in proposal and estimations
Ability to establish good relationship with colleagues, manufacturing engineers and get things done.

Key values, beliefs, and attitudes

Results-orientation: Focus on Customers, provide quality deliverables on time, within estimated effort with high quality
Characteristics for a design engineering services business: establish trust, responsive to change/adaptability; learn continuously, proactive, positive & joyful.

Who You Are?

Bachelor's degree in Electrical OR Electronics Engg (or related field) with electronic manufacturing background
Prior experience of at least 7 to 12 years in test bench engineering in electronics design/manufacturing services industry.
Good hands-on experience in developing GUI using NI LabVIEW. Experience with MySQL database, webservices protocol like XML, JSON etc. Experience in wrapper drivers for NI hardware, process models, sequence development, user configuration and interfaces with Labview framework/ modules.
Technical understanding of production test requirements, modern test engineering, aware of tools & equipment such as NI hardware, DMM, DAQ, GPIB, PXI, sensor interface etc.
Good verbal and written communication skills for documentation and reporting.
Certified Developer of National Instruments LabVIEW and/or Test stand Quality Process Certifications in ISO and other relevant global standards.
Experience in LabVIEW and Teststand.
Hands on experience in Data acquisition, Sequence Development.
Keyskills
TeststandATEData acquisitionSequence DevelopmentLabVIEW
Desired Candidate Profile
Please refer to the Job description above
Company Profile
Centum Electronics Limited
Centum Adeneo India is a Business unit of Centum Electronics Group offers a wide range of electronic and embedded systems design engineering services to Global Customers to help them realize complex products and sub systems. Centum-Adeneo India (CAI) is an Electronics Design Center of Excellence, designing for mission critical projects in Aerospace/Space, Transportation, Medical Electronics, Defense Electronics etc. It has other design centers in the France, USA, Canada & Germany

Contact Company:Centum Electronics Limited

Title: CSII - Item and inventory - Sr Support Engineer (JAVA)
Description:
CSII Operations Support – Software Support Engineer
Senior Software Support Engineer

Our Company:
We help people around the world save money and live better - anytime and anywhere - in retail stores, online and through their mobile devices. Each week, more than 230+ million customers and members visit our 11000+ stores under 69 banners in 27 countries and e-commerce websites in 10 countries. With last fiscal year revenues of approximately $482 billion and 2.2 million employees worldwide, Walmart is simply the largest retail business in the world.

@ Walmart Labs in Chennai, we enable an ecosystem wherein our customers can “save money so they can live better” by using technology for the charter of building brand new platforms ,services on latest technology stack and operation support to both our e-commerce and stores businesses worldwide.

Our Team:
CSII Team is responsible for operations, Stability and reliability of highly optimized supply chain suite of products to manage entire gamut of supply chain lifecycle for our retail and ecommerce lines of business. With our rapidly increasing footfalls in stores and exponential growth in online orders; this all has to be done to scale millions of owned and marketplace SKU’s complete inbound and outbound fulfilment lifecycles.
Team’s mission - “Enable customers to receive their orders when and where they want in an innovative and cost effective way for Walmart“ derives from Walmart’s mission statement - “Save Money. Live Better” complementing our organization’s philosophy to deliver low prices every day, on everything.
How we achieve this, comes down to the team of Operation specialist and smartest technologists from India focused on the entire suite of supply chain management products for the Walmart Supply Chain at a massive scale. From forecasting & replenishing inventory for millions of items worth billions of dollars, sourcing of millions of orders, to route optimization & last mile delivery to Warehouse Management Systems to most advanced grocery & order management systems & Item and inventory Systems. Operations team will minimize any disturbance to Supply chain operations by proactively identifying and remediate potential cause resulting in minimum to zero system downtime.

With over 4,000 associates in Silicon Valley, San Diego, Portland, Brazil, United Kingdom and India, we’re bringing together some of the best professionals from around the world. If you’re inspired by the opportunity to solve complex problems at scale and make a difference for our customers and members, join us.

Your Responsibility:
1. Independently own and address and resolve applications issues, provide updates and perform root cause analysis.
2. Plan, execute and implement applications and configuration change procedures
3. Supervise all alerts related to application and system procedures and provide services proactively.
4. Maintain good professional relationships with counterparts of engineering, Platform support and end Users etc.
5. Gain and maintain expertise in flow of application process and systems related to domain
6. Flexibility - responsibilities may require occasional evening and weekend work
7. Coordinate across teams and resolve all complex application and system issues ranging in complexity (Low to Critical)
8. Install and prepare tools required for proper functioning of applications on regular basis.
9. Coordinate with departments and QA departments and administer code migrations in various environments and production outputs.
10. Manage all production system and recommend ways to optimize performance and provide solution to problems and prepare reports for all problems.
11. Follow standards and best practises to bring operational efficiencies, stability and availability of the system.
12. Comprehend various metrics on operational dashboards and reports and take corrective actions

Your Qualifications:
1. An Engineering Degree - B.E/B.Tech/MS/PhD in any stream – Computer Science preferred.
2. 4-8 + years of relevant experience with the following skills
3. knowledge of operating systems, Databases, application stacks and network systems
4. Previous experience dealing with support cases or requests via e-mail, telephone and in person
5. Basic systems ,software engineering and Architecture knowledge
6. Ability to code/Script in one of the languages (C#, Python and Java) and working knowledge of SQL and Databases
7. Basic knowledge and understanding in emerging technologies of Cloud, Distributed computing and big data
8. Worked on monitoring and alerting tools

Our Ideal Candidate

Our ideal candidate is an energetic, self-motivated individual focused on solving customer problems. He/She is a responsive team player who can proactively contribute for building technical strategies for operations, applications and systems by promoting an understanding of the technology and business roadmap. He /she is someone who thrives in a fun, fast-paced, dynamic, startup-like environment with following key skills
1. Exceptional verbal and written communication skills
2. Listening ability and patience
3. Critical thinking, complex Problem Solve and Troubleshoot
4. Excellent interpersonal skills in areas such as teamwork, facilitation, and negotiation, and
5. Able to work independently or as part of a team.
6. Ability to explain complex ideas to those with limited IT and systems knowledge
7. Demonstrate ability to independently learn technologies and process thru continuous learning
8. Ability to work as part of a cross-cultural team including flexibility to support multiple locations when necessary,

Key Technology Skills:

Skill set 1 : Item & Inventory - Support / Technical Operations (JAVA)
Core Skills : JAVA,J2EE, Scripting (Shell/Python)
DataBase: NoSQl-Cassandra
Messaging and communication: Kafka/RESTful

Architecture: Microservices

Title: Solution Architect - SFCC
Description:
Job Description
Solution Architect – eCommerce
Job Description
The Consumer and Marketing Technologies Department is the IT Engine that delivers robust solutions to Kimberly-Clark’s marketing teams by working with the appropriate internal and external resources including vendor partners. Our goal is to deliver innovative, efficient and cost-effective solutions to meet enterprise needs thereby driving business growth and profitability.
The eCommerce Solution Architect is a technology leader who will be responsible for architecting a global D2C (Direct-to-Consumer) platform that seamlessly integrates with other marketing platforms in line with the global digital platform vision. The architect has the key responsibility for the D2C technical stack built around Salesforce Commerce Cloud (SF C C) . He/she is responsible for building a platform with minimum customization while offering the right level of flexibility through configuration . As a hands-on expert, the Solution Architect will ensure that SFCC components and integrations are loosely coupled to be used across global implementations in a cost - effective way .
This role will work with appropriate global teams to ensure compliance with the enterprise security guidelines. The Solution Architect will be accountable for the identification, tracking, mitigating, remediation, and verification of CRM security vulnerabilities globally.
The right person for this role is proactive with stakeholders, a self-starter who can work under broad direction, and passionate about delivering world-class digital products that enable the business to optimize operations to maximize the value of K-C investments.
Key Accountabilities
Facilitate the leadership vision around building a global D2C platform by taking a platform approach to architecture and implementation.
Create reusable components and services using Salesforce Commerce cloud and related technologies to drive the business outcomes and the global platform vision.
Promote reuse of technology implementations by architecting and implementing reusable APIs/microservices, frameworks and technology abstractions across regions and markets.
Provide technology leadership for implementation of new technology platform / capabilities, by performing design reviews, code walkthroughs / review to ensure adherence to standards and security guidelines.
Provide technical due diligence of software products and platforms. Create technical assessments, based on criteria including cost, security, vendor fit, alignment to objectives, reliability, and scalability
Perform root-cause analysis of application related incidents and help improve the status quo through innovative solutions .
Drive improvements in engineering practices to optimize cost and quality
Maintain and evolve cultural awareness; act with global fluency. Adopt a test and learn, fail fast mindset with calculated risk taking.
Act as a disruptive change agent fluidly moving back and forth between transformation initiatives and day-to-day business as usual. Delivers right mix of operations, delivery, strategy and innovation.
Key Qualifications and Experiences
A degree in computer science or equivalent.
Functional background of CPG / retail business is a plus.
S trong SDLC experience including Agile/Waterfall is required.
Strong facilitation, leadership, creative thinking, and collaboration skills required. Must display resiliency and the ability to engage and communicate with stakeholders at all levels of an organization.
Experience working with virtual teams across time zones
Technical and development experience:
Minimum of 5 years of hands on experience in the architecture, design, development and implementation of large - scale web and mobile applications for consumers adhering to non-functional requirements like security, reliability, scalability and availability standards.
5+ year of experience in implementing eCommerce application s using Salesforce Commerce Cloud (SFCC) and /or Demandware is required. At least the last two years of experience is expected to be in Salesforce Commerce Cloud.
Strong, in-depth, p rogramming skill s in a popular programming language like Java adopting practices like CI/CD using Jenkins , TDD, BDD etc. is required.
Good working knowledge on the Storefront Reference Architecture (SFRA)
Good understanding of object-oriented programming, relational databases and build script, deep understanding of the deployment considerations specific to SaaS based cloud server are expected.
Experience in integrating ecommerce stores with external payment gateways and such other third - party eCommerce service providers is a must . Also, understanding of MOR, SOR etc. is an advantage.
Good understanding data privacy and data protection regulations like GDPR, CCPA is desired. Experience implementing solutions adhering to PCI regulations is an advantage.
Strong experience in API’s (SOAP/REST) and database technologies is expected .
Experience with front end development technologies (HTML5, CSS, JQuery )
Experience integrating on-premise and cloud - base d SaaS solutions is a must . A WS or Azure cloud experience is a plus .
Exposure to other products in the Salesforce suite is a plus .
Global VISA and Relocation Specifications:
K-C requires that an employee have authorization to work in the country in which the role is based. In the event an applicant does not have current work authorization, K-C will determine, in its sole discretion, whether to sponsor an individual for work authorization. However, based on immigration requirements, not all roles are suitable for sponsorship.
This role is available for local candidates already authorized to work in the role’s country only. K-C will not provide relocation support for this role.
Primary Location
IT Centre Bengaluru GDTC
Additional Locations
Worker Type
Employee
Worker Sub-Type
Regular
Time Type
Full time

Title: Java Developer with Kubernetes (Backend) - Remote Opportunit...
Description:
About Trantor
Trantor, Inc., a leading provider of global software services, specializes in Business Intelligence, Software Security, and Web Services solutions. Trantor, Inc. has a proven and demonstrable track record of successful multi shore project delivery since its inception in 2009. Trantor, Inc. is a leading software development company with expertise in both Cloud-based and traditional applications. Trantor understands all aspects and challenges of software development from product and feature definition, though core product development and QA / deployment / ongoing maintenance. We have also developed our own product suite and integrated it to several market applications.

Why Working at Trantor:
We value diverse perspectives and hire specifically to enrich our team with new ideas and experiences.
Learning is a top priority. We actively structure teams and projects to maximize team member growth and opportunity.
We believe in open communication and in sharing opinions, not in micromanagement.
We have a strong work ethic but value life outside of work.
Many of us have worked together at previous companies, and choose to work together again and again because we respect one-another.
Profile Overview:
Trantor is looking for a Software Engineer to join one of our Cloud Development teams to build solutions that will help us deliver an industry-leading security product to our customers. Join a talented team of developers using a wide variety of latest cloud technologies to solve big problems while partnering with threat researchers who are on the bleeding edge of malware analysis. You’ll build solutions that our customers are clamoring for, that will help our customers prevent the next front-page security breach.

What You’ll Do
Lead Initiatives to deliver major product features in a highly-scalable microservice environment implemented on AWS.
Contribute to product direction in design discussions.
Collaborate with the team to build upon and improve the microservices architecture.
Review and guide the development of Restful APIs to query terabytes of data.
Participate in all phases of the software development cycle as part of a Scrum team.
Proactively move the technology base to use the latest tools and frameworks for best performance; considering costs and scale.
Collaborate with product management, DevOps, backend, and front-end engineers to deliver the right solution.
Support existing production code and improve performance and customer experience.
What You’ll Bring
Expertise in building a high-performance, highly distributed, scalable and reliable system to process and store terabytes of data.
5+ years of experience developing server-side applications.
4+ years building high performing/data-intensive applications running in the cloud.
Improving performance, scalability, and reliability of systems
Experience with:
Java, Springboot & Microservices
AWS
Infrastructure
MySQL
Kubernetes
Restful APIs
Scaling enterprise applications in the cloud
Reducing costs in production
Agile Software Development

Title: Systems Support Analyst 4
Description:
About Wells Fargo

Wells Fargo & Company (NYSE: WFC) is a leading global financial services company headquartered in San Francisco (United States). Wells Fargo has offices in over 30 countries and territories. Our business outside of the U.S. mostly focuses on providing banking services for large corporate, government and financial institution clients. We have worldwide expertise and services to help our customers improve earnings, manage risk, and develop opportunities in the global marketplace. Our global reach offers many opportunities for you to develop a career with Wells Fargo. Join our diverse and inclusive team where you will feel valued and inspired to contribute your unique skills and experience. We are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do. Help us build a better Wells Fargo. It all begins with outstanding talent. It all begins with you.
Market Job Description

About Enterprise Global Services

Enterprise Global Services (EGS) enables global talent capabilities for Wells Fargo Bank NA., by supporting over half of Wells Fargo's business lines and staff functions across Technology, Business Services, Risk Services and Knowledge Services. EGS operates in Hyderabad, Bengaluru and Chennai in India and in Manila, Philippines. Learn more about EGS at our International Careers website.
Department Overview

Working for a global leader in banking, Wells Fargo & Company is one of the world's largest banks and employs more than 270,000 people worldwide. Our international business activities truly span the globe, with our coast-to-coast U.S. presence, overseas offices in strategic locations and technology platforms, we provide our clients the direct and on-the-ground support they need to effectively manage all their global business in 130 countries.

In October 2015, Wells Fargo launched an initiative to build a customer-facing, enterprise-wide channel to support our customers' desire to leverage emerging technology. This new channel, called Wells Fargo Gateway, will enable the company to package Wells Fargo products and services as discrete 'micro-services' delivered through real-time messaging technology. Often referred to as APIs (application program interface), these discrete services can be easily embedded within other digital environments or software platforms so customers can access Wells Fargo products wherever and whenever they choose.




About the Role

Technical Support Specialist (TSS) role Provides technical support to customers during their initial integration stage in addition to on-going production support.

Experience in Agile Scrum development models. Specially working experience in distributed agile development teams


Market Skills and Certifications

Estimation techniques in Agile methodologies
Review the needs of platform and coordinate with Platform Architects and Developers.
Essential Qualification

We Value Diversity

At Wells Fargo, we believe in diversity and inclusion in the workplace; accordingly, we welcome applications for employment from all qualified candidates, regardless of race, color, gender, national or ethnic origin, age, disability, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other status protected by applicable law. We comply with all applicable laws in every jurisdiction in which we operate.

Title: QA Automation Engineer(Mobile)
Description:
Position Title: QA Automation Engineer(Mobile)
Summary:
The QA Automation Engineer position at CapitalCloud, A Bottomline company is a challenging and rewarding one. In this role you will be responsible for analysining user needs, participate to develop test strategy, write test cases, develop test automation scripts/framework to support continuous integration. You will need to work with developers and other QA engineers in defining optimal automation plan as per product release timelines. You will have an opportunity to learn new automation tools and propose the same for usage in future automation framework development.
This position is based at our Bangalore, India office.
Responsibilities:
Development and maintenance of Automated Test frameworks.
Review automation code and provide suggestions
Develop test automation scripts in Appium driver Page Object Model framework along with maintaining and enhancing the automation test framework supporting a continuous integration environment with automated smoke and regression test suite
Analyze user needs and software requirements to determine feasibility of design within time and cost constraints.
Work closely with developers and other QA engineers to discuss defects and resolutions
Utilize appropriate testing tools for both front-end and back-end Quality Assurance
Coordinate and manage automated testing efforts for concurrent projects and software releases, including coordinating test automation schedules, environments, and configuration requirements for assigned testing activities and provide feedback to internal and external clients.
Requirements:
Proven 2+ years of experience in automation framework development for Mobile native applications.
Automation using Appium experience a must.
Nice to have automation experience on web application using selenium.
Having knowledge on Flutter driver, flutter gherkin will be added advangeous.
Technical knowledge of at least some of following languages: Java, JavaScript, Dart, NodeJS
Technical knowledge of at least some of the following applications: Android Studio, Xcode, IntelliJ IDEA, Eclipse.
Understanding mobile application delivery model to playstores/appstores is good to have.
Working knowledge and experience with JIRA, Confluence and Git is a must.
Ability to perform automated testing against mobile applications on emulators or real devices.
Experience with SauceLabs or Browserstack is a plus
Ability to perform automated testing against RESTful services and Web Application is plus
Test reporting knowledge and review, using Cucumber, TestNG, SoapUI and ReportPortal
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Outstanding problem-solving skills and ability to own and self-manage daily tasks
About CapitalCloud, A Bottomline Company:
Bottomline Technologies provides collaborative payment, invoice and document automation solutions to corporations, financial institutions and banks around the world. The company's solutions are used to streamline, automate and manage processes involving payments, invoicing, global cash management, supply chain finance and transactional documents. Organizations trust these solutions to meet their needs for cost reduction, competitive differentiation and optimization of working capital.
Serving industries such as financial services, insurance, health care, technology, communications, education, media, manufacturing and government, Bottomline provides products and services to approximately 80 of the Fortune 100 companies and 70 of the FTSE (Financial Times) 100 companies.

Title: Technology Lead
Description:
About Wells Fargo

Wells Fargo & Company (NYSE: WFC) is a leading global financial services company with $2.0 trillion in assets and offices in over 37 countries. Founded in 1852 and headquartered in San Francisco, Wells Fargo provides asset management, capital raising and advisory, financing, foreign exchange, payments, risk management, and trade finance services to support customers who conduct business in the global economy. At Wells Fargo, we want to satisfy our customers' financial needs and help them succeed financially. We also value the viewpoints of our team members and encourage them to be their best. Join our diverse and inclusive team where you will feel valued and inspired to contribute your unique skills and experience. We are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do. Help us build a better Wells Fargo. It all begins with outstanding talent. It all begins with you. Learn more at our International Careers website.

Wells Fargo Indiaenables global talent capabilities for Wells Fargo Bank NA., by supporting business lines and staff functions across Technology, Operations, Risk, Audit, Process Excellence, Automation and Product, Analytics and Modeling. We are operating in Hyderabad, Bengaluru and Chennai locations.

We Value Diversity

Title: Tech Lead Product Owner
Description:
The Product Manager oversees Developer and Support tools under the direction of the Product Partner Ecosystem group, aiming at the flawless execution of the activities within the Ecosystem Program. He/she is the product champion within the company and will be viewed as the "expert" for accurate and credible information on the product. The Product Manager is responsible for establishing, maintaining and planning the overall developer tools including developer portal, certification program while interacting with engineering, services, corporate IT and operations group. The Product Manager is responsible for creating the concepts, requirements and a variety of analyses for new products and product improvements.
Major Functions/Responsibility
Set the solution marketplace, developer and support tools for partner programs, prioritize features, build consensus, and coordinate product schedules with developers and/or partners to deliver high-quality experiences for our internal teams and our customers and partners.
Build use cases and user stories around the tools requirements and communicate them effectively.
Maintain a roadmap for partner certification program, developer portal to delight users and increase Customer and Partner satisfactions.
Integrate user research, analysis, and stakeholder feedback into your product requirements to ensure products satisfy user needs as well as meet the needs of the business.
Facilitate communication throughout the development process by partnering with key departments, especially engineering, services, operations and corporate IT.
Identify methods and metrics for identifying success and failures.
Coordinate with other product managers to ensure cohesiveness.
Demonstrates good judgment in selecting methods and techniques for obtaining solution.
Empowers internal personnel by sharing area of expertise freely vs hoarding knowledge
Performs other duties, as assigned.
Acting subject matter expert expected to know and understand new features and feature improvement.
Day to day project management, coordination, and delivery of projects related to assigned products.
Experience Requirement:
6+ years of product management experience with formal product management techniques, and tools involved in planning and delivering new software products and services.
Fluency reading and understanding API, developer documentation and technical documents.
Strong bonus if you bring validated experience product managing a certification program, developer portal.
Demonstrated ability to understand and translate non-technical feature descriptions into structured use cases, requirements, and specifications for technical audiences.
Excellent oral and written communication skills in English including vocabulary, spelling, composition, and grammar.
Reading and comprehension and understanding technical information well enough to convey in original written communications to multiple audiences.
Personal interaction with technical resources and listen carefully, taking time to understand the points being made, and asking questions where appropriate.
Excellent skills with specialized computer software for drafting and producing documents and diagrams.
Driven self-starter; detail oriented, clear, logical thinker, technical thinker, bright and energetic
Works well in fast paced, high pressure environments with the ability focus on goals and objectives

Title: Senior Front End Engineer
Description:
The position is full-time and would be based at the company’s Chennai office. The successful applicant would have 7+ years of relevant experience where he deliver robust and innovative features and fixes at a rapid pace into our enterprise financial services applications. As a senior Front End Engineer, the ideal person will be motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming, and will be responsible for the translation of UI / UX wireframes and prototypes to actual, performance-driven front-end code that will produce the visual touch-points of the application. Applicant will be working closely with the UX, Design and Development teams and bridge the gap between visual design and technical implementation with your creativity and technical expertise, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works for the local Chennai office. They will be responsible for users in all FE offices, covering UK, India, Czech Republic, Hong Kong and Australia.
Key Responsibilities
Engineer creative and intuitive user interfaces for the front end
Build reusable code including libraries, front end architectures and frameworks for future use
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX Designs.
Optimise the front-end architecture for maximum speed and scalability
Ensure secure-by-design principles are adhered to, including secure front end code and user input validations.
Collaborate with team members and key stakeholders effectively
Key Technical Skills
As a Senior Front End Developer you will be required to:
Have over 7 years of relevant experience developing front end software
Proficient understanding of web markup including HTML5, CSS3 and higher Level 4 modules.
Proven expertise with server side CSS pre-processing platforms such as LESS and SASS
Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery and Angular (at least 2+ years in Angular)
Excellent understanding of async request handling, partial page updates and AJAX.
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to overcome them.
Beneficial Technical Skills
Good knowledge of UI/UX and design paradigms, image authoring tools such as Photoshop or GIMP.
Knowledge and / or experience with other JavaScript libraries and frameworks including Knockout, Backbone, React, Meteor, Aurelia, Node.JS / NPM, etc.
Understanding of Microsoft tools, technologies and principles such as Microsoft Visual Studio, Visual Studio Team Services, Azure, Secure Development Lifecycle, etc. would be an added advantage.
Key Behavioural Skills
Versatile and good at written and verbal communication as the role would require extensive collaboration with teams across UK and India.
Exhibit a creative bent of mind, and demonstrate creative approaches to problem solving that bridge design and development.
Consistently strives towards improving the product, design and process by challenging ways to bring the best approach forward.
How to Apply

If you have any questions regarding this job, please feel free to email india.jobs@financialexpress.net
